languages.text: {n}Маражай смеривает вас долгим пристальным взглядом. Пауза начинает затягиваться, когда он наконец-то небрежно роняет.{/n} "Сделай так, чтобы я не разочаровался в своих территориях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову.{/n} "Сделай так, чтобы я не разочаровался в своих территориях".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай смеривает вас долгим пристальным взглядом. Пауза начинает затягиваться, когда он наконец-то небрежно роняет.{/n} "Сделай так, чтобы я не разочаровался в своих территориях".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "Make sure that I am not disappointment in my territories."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "Make sure that I am not disappointment in my territories."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage longuement. Le temps reste suspendu un long moment, puis il se décide enfin à reprendre, d'un ton nonchalant :{/n} « Veillez à ce que mon terrain de jeu soit à la hauteur de mes attentes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage longuement. Le temps reste suspendu un long moment, puis il se décide enfin à reprendre, d'un ton nonchalant :{/n} « Veillez à ce que mon terrain de jeu soit à la hauteur de mes attentes. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは長い間じっとあなたを見つめてから、淡々と告げた。{/n}「俺が割り当てられた領域に失望することがないよう、気を付けるんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは長い間じっとあなたを見つめてから、淡々と告げた。{/n}「俺が割り当てられた領域に失望することがないよう、気を付けるんだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋盯着你看了很久，一言不发，最后终于若无其事地开了口。{/n}“分给我的那片狩猎场，最好别让我失望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋盯着你看了很久，一言不发，最后终于若无其事地开了口。{/n}“分给我的那片狩猎场，最好别让我失望。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich lange an. Die Pause zieht sich unangenehm hin, bis er endlich beiläufig sagt:{/n} "Sorgt dafür, dass ich nicht enttäuscht von dem mir zugewiesenen Territorium bin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich lange an. Die Pause zieht sich unangenehm hin, bis er endlich beiläufig sagt:{/n} "Sorgt dafür, dass ich nicht enttäuscht von dem mir zugewiesenen Territorium bin."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira durante un largo rato. El silencio comienza a incomodarte, hasta que por fin habla con tono despreocupado.{/n} «Procura que mi nuevo coto de caza no me decepcione».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira durante un largo rato. El silencio comienza a incomodarte, hasta que por fin habla con tono despreocupado.{/n} «Procura que mi nuevo coto de caza no me decepcione».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana uzun uzun bakıyor. Duraksama daha da uzayacak gibi görünmeye başlarken sonunda soğukkanlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Tahsis edilen bölgem, hayal kırıklığı yaratmasın o zaman."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai gives you a long look. The pause starts to drag on when he finally says nonchalantly,{/n} "See to it that I am not disappointed with my allotted territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana uzun uzun bakıyor. Duraksama daha da uzayacak gibi görünmeye başlamışken sonunda soğukkanlılıkla konuşuyor:{/n} "Tahsis edilen bölgemin hayal kırıklığı yaratmamasını sağla."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
